name: Formants
descr: Estimate the F1/F2 formant values of an audio file over phoneme intervals. Several methods can be enabled independently, including in-house implementations and ones derived from Praat (via Parselmouth).

options.text: Pattern of the input file with phonemes.
Pattern of the output file with F1 and F2 values.
Threshold of the RMS value for the detection of silences, 0=automatic.
Hamming window duration for self-implemented LPC methods (in seconds).
Order for self-implemented LPC methods. Usually ranging 6-20.
Minimum frequency to consider for formants for self_implemented methods.
Enable the Burg method estimated by Praat (via Parselmouth).
